quote: What we're doing is fun - if you have any sense of humor at all!
author: Calvin Klein

quote: I love poking fun at myself. I have a rather mean sense of humor.
author: Alton Brown

quote: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
author: Walt Disney Company

quote: Life is more fun if you play games.
author: Roald Dahl,  My Uncle Oswald

quote: I love doing the action stuff. It's soooo much fun!
author: Paul Walker

quote: Life is just so much fun and so filled with humor.
author: Foster Friess

quote: I enjoy my fun time and everything like that but I love what I do.
author: Christina Milian

quote: That's the key to success, isn't it? It has to be fun.
author: Monica Seles

quote: I want to have fun. Life ain't no dress rehearsal. I want to have fun. I'm a comedian; I ain't no politician. So everything I do is with humor, with love.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: If you never did you should. These things are fun and fun is good.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Adventures are never fun while you're having them.
author: C.S. Lewis,  The Voyage of the Dawn Treader

quote: Tell me that the purpose of life is to have fun, and without a care in the world I'll begin wreaking havoc on everything I pass. Now that's what I call pure, honest fun.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: If it gets laughs, it's funny.
author: Rachel Dratch

quote: Look at me!Look at me!Look at me NOW!It is fun to have funBut you have to know how.
author: Dr. Seuss,  The Cat in the Hat (Deluxe Edition)

quote: Enjoy it. Because it's happening.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Putting a little time aside for clean fun and good humor is very necessary to relieve the tensions of our time.
author: Hattie McDaniel

quote: A sense of humor saves your life, and being able to make friends wherever you go.
author: Jason O'Mara

quote: If you obey all of the rules, you miss all of the fun.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Teasing and a sense of humor, if you can develop that in your kids, and if you can exercise it with the kids, just makes for a pleasanter atmosphere.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Punctuation, is? fun!
author: Daniel Keyes,  Flowers for Algernon

quote: Drinking is fun! It makes me feel horrible and sexy!
author: Warren Ellis

quote: Laugh as much as you breathe and love as long as you live.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  Born of Shadows

quote: Humor and laughter - not necessarily derogatory derision - are my pet tools. This may come from my general philosophy of never taking the world too seriously - for fear of dying of boredom.
author: Marcel Duchamp

quote: I'm usually just enjoying life.
author: Alan Jackson

quote: I think that success is having fun.
author: Bruno Mars

quote: I love going to the movie theatre, seeing live comedy, and going to amusement parks.
author: Jennette McCurdy

quote: Life is too short to not have fun; we are only here for a short time compared to the sun and the moon and all that.
author: Coolio

quote: I think people should have fun. And don't get so down on yourself. Enjoy life and be the best person you can be.
author: Keke Palmer

quote: Having just enough life to enjoy being dead.
author: Jim Holt,  Why Does the World Exist?: An Existential Detective Story

quote: I love doing comedy. You don't get many good comedy scripts. They're rare. But, I do love playing comedy. Even in drama, I like to try to find the humor because I think it's very human.
author: Colm Meaney

quote: Live fast. Die young. Be wild. Have fun.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: I can't live without a sense of humor. I need to be laughing and entertained at all times.
author: Carlos Ponce

quote: All I do is have fun. When I'm not working, it's about making people laugh. I love making jokes about things. Even when someone's mad at me, I'll deflect anger with humor. My days are filled with laughter. If I'm not laughing, I'm not happy.
author: Drew Fuller

quote: When I play a game, I want to play, not necessarily laugh. If you try to make me laugh at the expense of interactivity, then you've just created another funny game that isn't very fun. The videogame medium itself is a terrible place for complicated humor, drama, and character development.
author: Doug TenNapel

quote: My hobbies include rubbing my nipples across a cheese grater, meeting cat ladies on Tinder, and voting for either Democrat or Republican every four years. You could say I am a torture enthusiast.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Live well, Laugh often, Love much.
author: Bessie Anderson Stanley

quote: I like doing comedy, I like doing drama. Naturally I like to do, I like doing dramas, I like conflict, and when I do a comedy, you know, I've found that, like, romantic comedy is the trickiest one, because often it's neither: it's not romantic and it's not funny. So, like, I like a comedy that's biting. It's biting humor or really quirky humor.
author: Matt Dillon

quote: The road is long, we carry on, try to have fun in the meantime.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: So, have a little fun. Soon enough you'll be dead and burning in Hell with the rest of your family.
author: George Carlin,  Brain Droppings

quote: A 'naughty pickle' is how I'd best describe myself. I think fun and laughter is the whole point of life.
author: Celia Imrie

quote: I set out to discover the why of it, and to transform my pleasure into knowledge.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Funny is a good foil. Humor is illuminating, and it also gives you power.
author: J. Tillman

quote: Enjoy your passion.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Since the goal of my programs is to show audiences how humor can both help them heal as well as deal with not-so-funny stuff, I decided to discuss the events of the previous week, the pain all of us were feeling, and how humor and some laughter might be beneficial.
author: Allen Klein

quote: To enjoy the magic of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It's the game of life. Do I win or do I lose? One day they're gonna shut the game down. I gotta have as much fun and go around the board as many times as I can before it's my turn to leave.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Once you can accept failure, you can have fun and success.
author: Rickey Henderson

quote: Happy wife, happy life.
author: Paul Orfalea,  Copy This!: Lessons from a Hyperactive Dyslexic who Turned a Bright Idea Into One of America's Best Companies

quote: I just love entertaining. I will do anything - stand-up comedy, video games, fencing, internet shorts - I just want to keep being lucky enough to entertain people anyway I can. I try never to limit my art to a medium.
author: Matthew Gray Gubler
